name: Mountain Parkour
description:
Mountain Parkour is a computer game in the genre of parkour, about a desperate man who went to conquer mountain peaks
to test himself and collect various crystals that once upon a time were scattered by someone and left by someone.
Collect crystals, go through dangerous, high and very long mountain paths. After collecting all the crystals,
you will be able to pick up what you came for - the biggest crystal! In this game you will find not only dangerous,
steep sections, but also very beautiful landscapes! This adventure will involve both children who will be able to gain
experience in managing and coordinating movement, and this game is also suitable for adults who, after work or busy days,
really want to relax and unwind. In any case, this exciting adventure will not leave anyone indifferent ! Play this game
and get exciting emotions from passing! Take a chance ! Go through all the mountain sections ! Can you Challenge yourself
in this game!
